english.segment1: Empty hands held high. Such a small sacrifice. If not joined with my life. I sing in vain tonight
english.segment2: May the words I say. And the things I do. Make my lifesong sing. Bring a smile to You
english.segment3: Chorus: Let my lifesong sing to You. Let my lifesong sing to You. I want to sign your name to the end of this day. Knowing that my heart was true. Let my lifesong sing to You
english.segment4: Lord, I give my life. A living sacrifice. To reach a world in need. To be Your hands and feet
english.segment5: So may the words I say. And the things I do. Make my lifesong sing. Bring a smile to you
english.segment7: Hallelujah. Hallelujah. Let my lifesong sing to You. (2x)
